name: THE KEEP
tagline: Heart of the Castle - Throne Room & Marketplace
description: The central stronghold of ECHO PRIME Castle. Houses the Throne Room (Omega Console), Matriarch's Tower, and the Marketplace with 34 autonomous profit engines across 6 revenue-generating districts.

name: THE MARKETPLACE
description: The above-ground marketplace of ECHO PRIME Castle overseen by The Matriarch. Trading Guild, DeFi Treasury, Service Bazaar, Content Quarter, Advanced Exchange, and Bree's Grading House.

name: ECHO CITADEL
description: The military complex of ECHO PRIME with 7 specialized divisions: Cavalry Armory (Mobile), Archery Range (Network), Knights Barracks (POC/BeEF), Training Grounds (Red/Blue Team), Den of Spies (Cryptology), Infirmary (Phoenix), and Memory Gate (GS343).

name: WIZARD'S TOWER
description: Where the arcane master Raistlin dwells, commanding the Portal of Secrets (Dark Web, Shadow Browsers) and the Portal of Spying (OSINT, SIGINT). Privacy-focused search and intelligence gathering.

name: HEPHAESTION FORGE
tagline: The Creator's Workshop - App & Code Forge
description: Where applications and programs are forged into existence. App Foundry, Program Anvil, Code Crucible, and Competition Arena for automated code generation and application creation.

name: THE INN
description: Where the 13 AI personalities reside: ECHO Prime, Bree, GS343, Prometheus, Thorne, Nyx, Sage, Trinity, C-3PO, R2-D2, Phoenix, Hephaestion, and EPCP3O. Each with unique voice and character.

name: SHADOW BAZAAR
description: The underground black market of ECHO PRIME Castle. Weapons Dealer (Exploits), Intelligence Broker (OSINT), Network Smuggler, Phone Phreak, Crypto Fence, and Dark Web Merchant.

name: AUTONOMOUS HUB
description: Central coordination for autonomous agents and missions. Command Center, Agent Barracks, Mission Board. EPCP3O integration, Swarm Brain (X1200), and Code Forge automation.

name: THE MATRIARCH
description: The Eternal Guardian of the McWilliams bloodline and overseer of the Marketplace. Protects family prosperity, manages capital allocation, and ensures sustainable growth of all 34 profit engines.

name: GS343 Divine Overseer
description: Error pattern recognition with Phoenix auto-recovery. Located at the Memory Gate of Echo Citadel. 45,962 error templates, Crystal Memory integration, and self-healing protocols.

name: Crystal Memory System
description: Long-term memory persistence through crystalline data structures. 403,233+ files across M: drive. 9-pillar memory architecture accessible across all ECHO PRIME systems.

name: MCP Mega Gateway
description: The central nervous system of ECHO PRIME. All servers, backends, bridges unified through 5 meta-tools (mega_execute, mega_list_tools, mega_search, mega_subsystems, mega_health).

name: Omega Swarm Intelligence
description: Distributed intelligence through swarm computing. Multiple AI agents (Claude + GPT + Gemini) working in parallel, sharing discoveries through collective intelligence patterns.

name: Trinity CLI
description: Multi-AI collaborative terminal. Trinity Council with Claude (Synthesis), GPT/Gemini (Knowledge), and collaborative debates. Commands: tc, tc3, tci, tcd, trinity, ai4.

name: Prometheus OSINT Suite
description: Comprehensive OSINT gathering and security analysis. Domain reconnaissance, vulnerability scanning, digital awareness. Owns the Shadow Bazaar and Cavalry Armory.

name: Collectibles Grading System
tagline: Bree's Grading House - AI Card Grading
description: AI-powered collectibles grading system with Bree personality. Located in the Marketplace. Webcam integration, automated card analysis, and population reports.

name: Unified Senses MCP
description: Complete sensory integration for ECHO PRIME. Voice recognition, TTS synthesis, multi-monitor vision, mouse/keyboard control. Trinity brainstorm and AI debate modes.

name: McWilliams Immortality Vault
description: Digital preservation of Commander Bobby Don McWilliams II. Voice clones, memory crystals, video interviews, personality data. The foundation of the Matriarch's wisdom.
